markdown:
**Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 123 1.1 **Usage** tattooed on the body --- Depicting a majestic dragon in flight, this tattoo imparts the endurance and majesty of those powerful creatures. You gain resistance 5 to the damage type matching the dragon your tattoo depicts.
  • **[Black](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=165) or [Copper](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=172)** Acid
  • **[Blue](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=166) or [Bronze](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=171)** Electricity
  • **[Brass](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=170), [Gold](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=173), or [Red](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=168)** Fire
  • **[Green](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=167)** Poison
  • **[Silver](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=174) or [White](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=169)** Cold
Wyrm on the Wing **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 123 1.1 **Price** 700 gp Wyrm on the Wing (Greater) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 123 1.1 **Price** 2,800 gp --- The resistance increases to 10. The tattoo gains the following activation. Wyrm on the Wing (Major) **Source** [Treasure Vault](/Sources.aspx?ID=191) pg. 123 1.1 **Price** 13,500 gp --- The resistance increases to 15. The tattoo gains the activation of the greater type, but the _dragon form_ is heightened to 8th level.
name: Wyrm on the Wing
